name: Next Dimension
description:
Do you like jumping into holes?

Of course you do!

Then *cough*you're weird*cough* (just kidding) you can try Next Dimension!

Next dimension is a game in which you have to get to the next dimension before it's too late. This game was made for the Pygame Community Summer Jam 2022 by the creator of Agile. The game is tested on Windows, although other platforms might not be able to run this game due to how some systems in the engine are built.

Assets and sounds used:
  • Awesome music by AK ♪ who generously let me use his soundtrack!
  • Thanks to Quintino Pixels for the very fitting tileset in the final stage!
  • Lucky to be able to have a  fitting tileset at the second last stage made by Erayzesen

By Skysurfer_kon#2199
